biotools.summary: A pipeline for particle detection in cryo-electron microscopy images using convolutional neural networks trained from positive and unlabeled examples. Topaz also includes methods for micrograph denoising using deep denoising models.

bioschemas.name: Topaz-Denoise
bioschemas.summary: A pipeline for particle detection in cryo-electron microscopy images using convolutional neural networks trained from positive and unlabeled examples. Topaz also includes methods for micrograph denoising using deep denoising models.
